text:
[Verse]
Neon nights and city glow
Walking fast through rain and snow
Lost in streets that never sleep
Love and dreams we'll always keep

[Verse 2]
Crowded clubs and subway trains
Music pumping in our veins
Dancing till we see the dawn
In a world that keeps us drawn

[Chorus]
City lights they guide our way
In the night they come to play
Heartbeats sync with every beat
In this place where paths all meet

[Verse 3]
Skyscrapers touching the sky
Reaching high like you and I
Every corner tells a tale
Of a love that won't derail

[Bridge]
Midnight rides and empty lanes
Holding hands through pouring rains
Stars above and lights below
In this glow we'll always grow

[Chorus]
City lights they guide our way
In the night they come to play
Heartbeats sync with every beat
In this place where paths all meet
title: City Lights
